Blog

Eric Gray

NETSCOUT Chief Solutions Architect and Sales Engineering Director Eric Gray is responsible for the company’s technical planning, architecture, and major account support in the western half of North America as well as for the management, development, and training of NETSCOUT’s sales engineering team. Formerly a system engineering director at Network General, his experience spans more than 25 years in the network management solutions market.
Blog Authors

Kirill Kasavchenko

Kirill Kasavchenko is a principal security technologist in the Office of the CTO at NETSCOUT. He has close to two decades of experience in various post- and presales roles dealing with telecom operators and large enterprises in more than 30 countries of Europe, the Middle East, Russia, and the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS).
Blog Authors

Philippe Alcoy

Philippe Alcoy currently serves as APAC Security Technologies for NETSCOUT, where he works across the research, strategy and pre-sales of DDoS threat detection, investigation and mitigation solutions for service provides and enterprises in Asia Pacific.
Blog Authors

Mark Doering

As director of technical marketing at NETSCOUT, Mark Doering supports security product development and the implementation of enterprise security solutions, engaging with NETSCOUT field sales and NETSCOUT customers as an advocate for the best architecture to achieve the desired outcome. Experienced
Blog Authors

Michael Segal

As the Area VP of Strategic Marketing at NETSCOUT, Michael is responsible for thought leadership, content marketing and customer advocacy for enterprise and service provider markets.

Darren Anstee

Widely recognized for his intimate knowledge of both network and security technologies, Darren Anstee often contributes to technical and business publications and is a featured speaker at industry events.
